name: Ext_R5_MeasureReport_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MeasureReport.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What individual(s) the report is for
element.definition: Optional subject identifying the individual or individuals the report is for.
element.comment: `MeasureReport.subject` maps to R4B `MeasureReport.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/HealthcareService)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
